post.body: I like sites like TechMeme, Memeorandum, BoingBoing and Metafilter bcuz of all the Zentact matches. One stop shopping for emails.
we just rolled out Flickr but they aren't pushing data to us; we're polling the same way you likely are. Let's compare notes.
NAD M15 and M25 electronics, B&W 803Ds speakers and a Rega P25 turntable.
great idea. After the move next week I'll set up the HT & do the full Flickr treatment w/ the boxes and the notes and the HEY HEY!
so I read your last tweet too quickly and thought you posted a video on removing *porn* stains. I guess I'm still in the dark there.
Enjoy the Heisman; Florida will be taking home the crystal football.
In 13 games, Tebow faced eight top-30 defenses. Bradford faced only two top-30 defenses and nine ranked 66th or worse. Just sayin
how many people are satisfied with McKinsey though?
have you installed Boxee on your AppleTV yet? Looking forward to playing around with it post-move and wanted to get your take.
what Gnip open house? Is there another Gnip out there now?
why ya hangin that pressure on me? I'm moving this weekend & neither blunt nor funny. Just a stressed-out dickhead. Oh, wait...
that's just cold, amigo. Now I don't even want to k ow when you're going to be in Boulder mid-Jan.
that totally makes sense. Charge people to check baggage and it all goes overhead.
is it true? Founders Fund? If so, congrats!
Aw, man, dide @jenniferlink make you take down your previous tweet? You gotsta keep your pimp hand strong, playa.
One hundred (wait for it) MEEELLION dollars.
what's your gamertag? I'm ericmarcoullier (lame, but functional).
3) was implicit in 2) in my line of thinking. Good to call it out, though.
the sit-stay is what makes the watching him such a joy; @sawickipedia Team Sawicki for the win!
Sorry to disappoint, but all I did was singularize "video games " as "video game", thus revealing my true nature as a dumbass.
Royse is three. He's done preschool before but Montessori is a whole different beast :)
A lil' Gnip love and a friend with a short code. He might launch this as a low cost monthly app and roll in other services.
How do you like getting @replies texted to your phone? Money, huh?
You are so money! A little bit of Gnip love and suddenly I get @replies back on my cell phone. You're a bear with teeth & claws!
I'm gonna play more Ratchet & Clank and maybe start fucking around with AppleTV hacking. @micah -- help a brotha w/ aTV reg code?
My Boulder Stereo http://bit.ly/8kBJ
Uploading six months of photos to Flickr. My Flickr use fell off a cliff when @davewiner 's Twittergram stopped working for me in June.
Grrr... can't say it feels like Xmas.
Can say it feels much like Xmas this year with the moving a week beforehand and all. But, on the plus side, Royse is getting a Cars bed :)
Oh good lord; Jen just successfully counted me into doing something: "One... two..." Seriously, I surrender my manhood right here.
Having an eargasm listening to side A of Pendulum's In Silico. Let's hear it for rock / Dn'B hybrids!
Wow, some honest to god rain in the sunset. Makes me happy.
Watching the 1997 Royal Rumble on Pay Per View. No, really, I even paid for it. It's like you don't even know me!
Any twitter friends want to face the Zombie Apocalypse on Xbox Live with a little L4D co-op?
Editing a fairly bulky 2009 financial spreadsheet on the Macbook Air and it's torture... soooo sloooowwww... Time to trade back up to a Pro?
In love with this awesome Flickr mashup: http://labs.ideeinc.com/multicolr/
Jen & kids went to bed at 9p. Now that I'm in Boulder, it's so easy to just run off to the office and get some work done. Yay, productivity!
Great. Apparently a *troll* lives in my butt.
Royse: "Poop lives in my butt!" Out of the mouth of babes, y'all.
Raisin' the roof to Cypress Hill's Rock Superstar. Royse and Parker are feelin' it too!
Fab Gnip strategy session ends with @jvaleski giving me a Beck - Gamma Ray driveby as he pulls out of the parking lot. Makes me love you!
Swear to god, we were first on the plane as Section 2 and the *entire* overhead cabin was full. WTF! I really hate flying.
Buttload of new Twitter followers due to my FRC holiday video performance. I also do bar mitzvas, weddings and strip-o-grams, so book early.
Yahoo deleting log data after 3 months. Yawn. I doubt they're deleting the metadata they attach to a user's profile based upon the log data.
Finally prep for move. Ten more hours as a San Franciscan (by location, anyway). Miss the city already.
Just realized I hadn't tweeted the great news that @jenmarcoullier finished her MBA. Once again she is quantitatively smarter than I.
Tired of economy news. I get it. It's fucked. But can entrepreneurs do anything beside 1) conserve cash and B) believe things will work out?
There's a special place in daddy hell for me, but Parker can sit, lie down and stand on command. Next up, I'm putting a treat on his nose.
Consider this the unicorn chaser to my previous iPhone / tongue tweet. Parker and I channeling Amy Winehouse: http://bit.ly/rehab
iPhone pro tip: when wearing gloves, you can use your tongue to scroll.
Doh! I have a type-o in my new Moo cards. I'll have to give all 200 of these out ASAP so I can order more. At least it's not contact info.
Watching Royse at his first morning at new school. He's growing up so much. Heart swelling with pride.
Fucking hell. I have to wait 3-5 minutes to let Hulu buffer and then every time they splice in a commercial they start a new stream. Laaame!
Aw, hell. Another dmfail.
Small biz, obvs, but is there enough that Danny can cover costs?
Gnip is pushing replies to Danny Newman, who then fires it out via his short code. Trying to figure out if there's biz there.
Gotta say though, getting at replies sent to my phone is rad. Reminds me of the old days, when track was alive, flowers were blooming and...
Reading the product description of the new Stuff White People Like book. I fucking hate being a clich√©. http://bit.ly/7asA
Fuck survival. The mantra for 2009 is Feature Velocity!
I'm not crazy: "AT&T has been sacrificing 2G signal strength in an effort to speed up ... its next gen 3G network." http://bit.ly/otoF
